name: Soul Remigration Pill
description: Can be bought from Xu Dog only in New Game+.

name: Septenary Heartfire Pill
description: Chapter 5 > Secret: Bishui Cave > Purge Pit: First, see How to Reach Chapter 5 Secret Area (Bishui Cave). From the shrine, perform a jump and a heavy attack in mid-air to reach the ledge behind it and you'll find this in the chest opposite you.

name: Ascension Powder
description: Automatically earned after defeating the "Supreme Inspector" boss at the start of Chapter 6.

name: Loong Aura Amplification Pellets
description: Can be bought from Xu Dog, available from the start of Chapter 5.

name: Enhanced Ginseng Pellets
description: Chapter 4 > Webbed Hollow > The Verdure Bridge: from the Shrine, tread across the vine planks and continue left until you can enter a side room with different chests.

name: Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets
description: Chapter 3 > Bitter Lake > Precept Corridor: from the Shrine, continue down the slope, hard to miss.

name: Mirage Pill
description: Chapter 4 > Webbed Hollow > The Verdure Bridge: from the Shrine, tread across the vine planks and drop at the cliff ahead, past the spider cocoons and the village up the stairs.

name: Body-Fleeting Powder
description: Chapter 3 > New Thunderclap Temple > Temple Entrance: From this shrine go straight forward, through a wooden temple building, then up the next staircase. After going upstairs, take the left path downstairs, enter the next building straight ahead, go up the stairs in the building. From the top floor go over the wooden bridge, at the end you find this in a golden container, next to the horse NPC.

name: Life-Saving Pill
description: Chapter 4 > Secret Area: Purple Cloud Mountain > Cloudnest Peak: First, see How to Reach Chapter 4 Secret Area. From the shrine, go right to find a small container with this formula.

name: Essence Decoction
description: Can be bought from Xu Dog, available from the start of Chapter 4.

name: Tonifying Decoction
description: Can be bought from Xu Dog, available from the start of Chapter 3.

name: Longevity Decoction
description: Can be bought from Xu Dog, available from the start of Chapter 2.

name: Fortifying Medicament
description: Acquired during Chen Loong questline, as part of the quest you have to talk to Xu Dog and he will give you this formula.

name: Evil Repelling Medicament
description: Dropped by boss "Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw" in Chapter 2 > Sandgate Village > Village Entrance: To the left of this shrine drop down the ravine and go down the path. At the end of the path you will find a flooded area with this frog miniboss.
